name: Ken's Labyrinth
description:
It is bad enough that Ken, the evil Zogarian, has threatened to destroy the earth, but now he has gone too far. He has kidnapped your dog! Can you survive the necessary journey to rescue poor Sparky from the dreadful labyrinth? We must warn you. Along the way, you will encounter giant mechanical spiders, huge robotic soldiers, devious moving holes, giant rolling 8-balls, and many creepy, unusual characters. To top it off, you must fight off Ken himself to get to your loyal friend and finally save the earth from destruction. In virtual reality 3D graphics, Ken's Labyrinth contains three full episodes and over 29 levels that you must reach to accomplish your task. Do you have the courage? Just remember, Sparky is counting on you.

*    Challenging fun for the whole family
*    No graphic violence
*    Full menu with story line
